item.description:
You're invited to our home in Haverhill for an evening of game playing. Let's also have a potluck dinner. In your RSVP, please post what you will bring so we don't have too many duplicate dishes.

We have a nice collection of games, but you are welcome to bring any you would like to play.

There are two cats and a dog in our house. The cats will be kept in a bedroom, but our friendly dog is free to roam.

Parking is available anywhere on the street.

Those who RSVP "yes" will get an e-mail that week with the specific address and directions.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Games & Potluck in Haverhill
